settings.subtext: Torque  Sensors. Experience the best of both worlds, feel the perfect synergy between precision and power. Our intelligent torque and cadence sensors work in harmony to adapt seamlessly to your pedaling style. Whether you're looking for a smooth, consistent boost or a dynamic, natural ride feel, this system delivers effortless acceleration, optimized efficiency, and total control.

Equipped with advanced damping and spring systems that absorb shocks and vibrations, providing a smooth and controlled ride. Adjust and fine-tune your suspension to suit your riding style and terrain.
The built-in brake light enhances safety by automatically illuminating when you apply the brakes, ensuring you're visible to others on the road, day or night.
Illuminate your path like never before with dual high-intensity bulbs. This headlight delivers twice the brightness, projecting a powerful beam that pierces through the darkness with ease.
Stay informed and in control with our vibrant LED color display, offering clear and easy-to-read information on speed, battery life, and more at a glance.
Our 7-speed derailleur ensures effortless and seamless shifting, allowing for quick and smooth gear changes across different riding conditions, keeping you in the perfect gear for any terrain.
Engineered for superior grip, these tires ensure stable and confident handling on various terrains, offering enhanced safety and performance in both wet and dry conditions.
Easily detach the battery for charging or storage. Its design ensures practicality and security, allowing extended rides with effortless recharging at home or on the go.

Enjoy versatile riding options with a combination of pedal assist and throttle. Pedal assist provides a boost to your pedaling effort, making climbs and long rides easier, while the throttle allows you to cruise effortlessly without pedaling when needed. Perfect for adapting to varying terrains and energy levels.

The sturdy rear rack offers reliable cargo support, while the integrated fender keeps you and your bike clean by deflecting dirt and water. A practical combo for added utility and a more comfortable ride.

settings.title: How long until I receive my bike?
settings.rich_content: The order will be process in 48 business hours. Once the order has shipped, a shipping confirmation email will be sent to your email. We use FedEx or UPS for shipping. Please allow 2~7 business days for the shipment to arrive to your designated location. Any delivery dates provided by Mokwheel are estimates.

settings.title: Do I need a license for riding Ebike?
settings.rich_content: No, you don’t need a license for riding Ebike. Please read Safety Instructions carefully for your safety.

settings.title: How do I charge my battery?
settings.rich_content: You can check the Battery and Charger of our E-BIKE USER MANUAL. The methods are listed in the manual with more detail.

settings.title: How to find the Ebike that fits me?
settings.rich_content: You can check our Compare Models for the differential of our Ebike.

settings.title: How to clean my Ebike?
settings.rich_content: We recommended you to take off the battery. Otherwise, you can clean the E-bike as the normal bike.

settings.title: What accessories come with Ebike?
settings.rich_content: We send a wrench, bicycle pump and front full fender, with our Ebike.

settings.faqs_question: What riding scenarios are suitable for this E-bike?
settings.faqs_answer: The Asphalt is suitable for urban commuting, supermarket shopping, campus riding, and weekend trips，and Asphalt is also suitable for light gravel roads and country roads.

settings.faqs_question: What is the difference between the male and female models?
settings.faqs_answer: The male and female models differ mainly in frame structure (top tube ), riding posture and ease of getting on and off the bike. The ST model is more suitable for women.

settings.faqs_question: What is the range of this e-bike? Is it suitable for commuting?
settings.faqs_answer: The Asphalt has a range of 50–60 miles, which is perfect for city commuting and short trips.

settings.faqs_question: Is the battery removable? How do I charge it?
settings.faqs_answer: Yes, the Asphalt is equipped with a removable 48V 14.7Ah battery, weighing about 9.92 pounds, which can be directly removed and taken home or to the office to charge with the included charger.

settings.faqs_question: Is the maintenance of Asphalt complicated? Is it suitable for people who don’t know how to repair it?
settings.faqs_answer: Absolutely no problem. Asphalt has a simple structure and mainly checks tire pressure, brakes and chains. It only needs simple maintenance every 1-2 months, and even novices can easily use it.
